browseRecipe.noRecipe: It appears your recipe book is empty. Click the Add tab below to add your first recipe.

recipeForm.name: Name
recipeForm.ingredientExplained: Input each ingredient on a separate line. Add precision or comment after a coma, like so:
recipeForm.stepsExplained: Input each step on a separate line.

planMeals.noRecipe: It appears your recipe book is empty.
planMeals.noMatch: No recipe match that name and filters

recipeBook.title: Recipe book
recipeBook.desc: Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card

mealsPlanning.title: Meals planning
mealsPlanning.desc: Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card

groceryList.title: Grocery list
groceryList.desc: Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card

createPlan.explain: In this step, select the first day and the number of days you want to plan for. In the next step, you'll be able to select recipes and quickly assign it a day.
createPlan.warning: Creating a new plan will erase the existing one.

blank.title: Create from blank
blank.desc: Fill in a form to add a recipe to your book.

url.title: Import from a Web page
url.desc: Paste the address of a page and have the app parse and import the recipe into your book.

photo.title: Take a picture
photo.desc: Use your device to take a picture of the recipe and use the app to import relevant parts.

picture.title: Use a picture
picture.desc: Use a picture already on your device and use the app to import relevant parts.
